content:
can convince a computer expert
that it has mental states then it really has those mental states. If, for
example, a machine could “converse” with a native Chinese speaker
in such a way as to convince the speaker that it understood Chinese
then it would literally understand Chinese. . . .
We  might  call  this  collection  of  theses  “strong  artificial  intelligence”
(strong AI).*These theses are certainly not obviously true and they are sel-
dom explicitly stated and defended.
